boardgame.name: BSG Express
Dark Moon
boardgame.description: WELCOME TO DARK MOON. The Noguchi Masaki interplanetary mining corporation welcomes you to its outpost on Titan, the dark moon of Saturn! You will be joining an experienced crew of miners, technicians, and adventurous souls who live to experience all the wonders that our solar system has to offer. Purpose, loyalty, camaraderie, friendship, and sacrifice all await you as a new and valued member of the Noguchi Masaki family!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;DARK MOON (formerly known as BSG Express), is a game of deception and betrayal at the cold edge of space._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; You are a crew member on a deep space mining expedition to Titan, the dark moon of Saturn. During a routine excavation, an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;incident_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; occurs whereby some of the crew become infected with an unknown virus, and become paranoid, deceitful, and violent, trying to destroy the others._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the start of the game, players are divided into two teams: Uninfected and Infected. The Uninfected team simply needs to survive until the end of the game, while the Infected team secretly attempts to destroy them. Each player knows which team they are on, but does not know which team the other players are on! Who is your teammate and who is your enemy? Can you trust your best friend? And why doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t anyone trust you when you tell them you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re one of the good guys?! _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Roll dice, overcome traumatic events, throw your friends in quarantine when you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;t believe them, and (if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;re Infected) betray everyone at just the right moment to secure victory!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: This is a professional-looking copy made by Andrew Tullsen (Howitzer_120mm) at PnP Productions. Everything needed to play the game is included in here.

Note: Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Version Game in very good condition. I will only charge the actual USPS shipping price (lowest possible) with delivery confirmation for the game. Feel free to browse through my other games for sale in the marketplace. I will provide free shipping in the continental US for orders over $150. I will also offer $10 off on shipping to anywhere else in the world for orders over $150.

Stronghold Games (SHG2011) DARK MOON (formerly known as BSG Express), is a game of deception and betrayal at the cold edge of space. You are a crew member on a deep space mining expedition to Titan, the dark moon of Saturn. During a routine excavation, an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;incident_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; occurs whereby some of the crew become infected with an unknown virus, and become paranoid, deceitful, and violent, trying to destroy the others. At the start of the game, players are divided into two teams: Uninfected and Infected. The Uninfected team simply needs to survive until the end of the game, while the Infected team secretly attempts to destroy them. Each player knows which team they are on, but does not know which team the other players are on! Who are your teammates and who your enemies? Can you trust your best friend? And why doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t anyone trust you?! Overcome traumatic events, throw your friends in quarantine when you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t believe them, and (if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re Infected) betray everyone at the right moment for victory!
Like new (cheap cardboard insert was removed). Only played twice! Will ship to CONUS via USPS. Thanks!

During a routine excavation, an _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;incident_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; occurs whereby some of the crew become infected with an unknown virus, and become paranoid, deceitful, and violent, trying to destroy the others.
